title: How to Add Cash to Apple Wallet without a Debit Card

steps.title: Open the Wallet app.
steps.content: Open the Wallet app. This looks like a wallet with colored cards in it. Apple Pay only supports some prepaid cards; to check if your card is compatible, contact your card issuer. If you're unsure, continue with the steps. You'll be notified if your card is not supported. [1] X Research source Make sure you're logged into the correct Apple ID and your iPhone or iPad is updated to the latest version .

steps.title: Add the card to your Wallet
steps.content: Add the card to your Wallet . You must have a valid card linked to your Wallet to send and receive money with Apple Cash . Tap + in the top-right corner. Tap Debit or Credit Card . Tap Continue . Tap Enter Card Details Manually and enter the details from your prepaid card. Tap Next , and then tap Agree . If you get an error that says "Could Not Add Card," "Wrong Name," "Invalid Card," "Card Device Limit," or errors about an address, first double-check the information you entered. If the card information is correct, the prepaid card you're trying to add does not support Apple Pay.

steps.title: Tap Apple Cash.
steps.content: Tap Apple Cash . If you don't already have Apple Cash set up, you'll need to do so now. Since you already have a card added to Wallet, you just need to accept the terms and select your default payment method. [2] X Research source If you don't see this option, return to the main Wallet screen, then tap your Apple Cash card. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the three dots ••• .
steps.content: Tap the three dots ••• . This will be in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Add Money.
steps.content: Tap Add Money . You can find this below the Apple Cash header.

steps.title: Enter an amount.
steps.content: Enter an amount. This amount will be taken from your prepaid card and added to your Apple Cash balance. You can add a minimum of $10 to a maximum of $10,000. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Add.
steps.content: Tap Add . The amount will be added. Additionally, when you receive money from others, it will be added to your Apple Cash balance.
